landing.bio: Recently completed MSc in Computer Science (NL) with major in Data Science from University College Dublin and seeking full opportunities for Data Analyst/Data Scientist/Business Analyst. Experienced professional with 2.7 years as a Software Engineer in Accenture India.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for Quality Assurance testing for an insurance software.

interests.paragraphOne: My interest as always been in the IT industry trying to learn about the new technologies coming or getting updated day to day. I always keep my myself updated with all new gadgets getting out from phones to smart watches.
interests.paragraphTwo: And I have a hobby of learning new things like a programming language or any new technologies which can later help me. It helps me keep my interest in place and excited me always.
